channel.title: Ramblings... by John Deighan
channel.description: Recent content on Ramblings... by John Deighan

item.title: CieloScript
item.description: I want to create a new language named CieloScript that is an extension of CoffeeScript with these features: Auto-imports and auto-install via .symbols file Statement to allow async code within sync functions multi-type HEREDOC syntax Typing syntax to allow 1) documentation, 2) assertions #include - to include files #define - to define variables END ends a file Allow additional type of quote: « (ALT+0171) » (ALT+0187) Retain JavaScript style shebang line The only for loop is for <item> in <iterable> Add a config file to allow, e.

item.title: Contact
item.description: John Deighan You can email me at cieloscript@pm.me
